scripts.deploy:api: dotenv -- curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$RENDER_DEPLOY_HOOK_API" && echo " api deploy triggered"
scripts.deploy:app: dotenv -- curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$RENDER_DEPLOY_HOOK_APP" && echo " app deploy triggered"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:app
